mapper.sql: serialNum, deliverSerial, stockInOutRecordSerial, supplyMaterielSerial, orderMaterielSerial, batchNum, manufactureDate, deliverCount, deliverRemark, acceptCount, refuseCount, takeRemark, qualifiedCount, unqualifiedCount, checkRemark, warehouseSerial, positionSerial, stockCount, unstockCount, stockRemark, remark, delFlg, creator, createTime, updater, updateTime

serialNum, deliverSerial,stockInOutRecordSerial, supplyMaterielSerial,orderMaterielSerial, batchNum, manufactureDate, deliverCount, deliverRemark, acceptCount, refuseCount, takeRemark, qualifiedCount as stockInQualifiedCount,unqualifiedCount as stockInUnqualifiedCount,checkRemark as stockInCheckRemark, warehouseSerial as stockInWarehouseSerial, positionSerial as stockInPositionSerial,stockCount as stockInCount,unstockCount as unstockInCount,stockRemark as stockInRemark, remark, delFlg, creator, createTime, updater, updateTime
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from deliveryMateriel
order by ${orderByClause}

distinct

order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into deliveryMateriel (serialNum, deliverSerial, stockInOutRecordSerial, orderMaterielSerial, supplyMaterielSerial, batchNum, manufactureDate, deliverCount, deliverRemark, acceptCount, refuseCount, takeRemark, qualifiedCount, unqualifiedCount, checkRemark, warehouseSerial, positionSerial, stockCount, unstockCount, stockRemark, remark, delFlg, creator, createTime, updater, updateTime ) values (#{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockInOutRecordSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderMaterielSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplyMaterielSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manufactureDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{deliverCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acceptCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refuseCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{takeRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualifiedCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unqualifiedCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unstockCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update deliveryMateriel
serialNum = #{record.serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deliverSerial = #{record.deliverSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stockInOutRecordSerial = #{record.stockInOutRecordSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orderMaterielSerial = #{record.orderMaterielSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplyMaterielSerial = #{record.supplyMaterielSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
batchNum = #{record.batchNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manufactureDate = #{record.manufactureDate,jdbcType=DATE},
deliverCount = #{record.deliverCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deliverRemark = #{record.deliverRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
acceptCount = #{record.acceptCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refuseCount = #{record.refuseCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
takeRemark = #{record.takeRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

positionSerial = #{record.positionSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stockCount = #{record.stockCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unstockCount = #{record.unstockCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stockRemark = #{record.stockRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delFlg = #{record.delFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

deliverSerial = #{deliverSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stockInOutRecordSerial = #{stockInOutRecordSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orderMaterielSerial = #{orderMaterielSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplyMaterielSerial = #{supplyMaterielSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
batchNum = #{batchNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

deliverCount = #{deliverCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deliverRemark = #{deliverRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
acceptCount = #{acceptCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refuseCount = #{refuseCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
takeRemark = #{takeRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qualifiedCount = #{qualifiedCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unqualifiedCount = #{unqualifiedCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkRemark = #{checkRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warehouseSerial = #{warehouseSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
positionSerial = #{positionSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stockCount = #{stockCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where serialNum = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update deliveryMateriel set deliverSerial = #{deliverSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stockInOutRecordSerial = #{stockInOutRecordSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderMaterielSerial = #{orderMaterielSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplyMaterielSerial = #{supplyMaterielSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batchNum = #{batchNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manufactureDate = #{manufactureDate,jdbcType=DATE}, deliverCount = #{deliverCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliverRemark = #{deliverRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acceptCount = #{acceptCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refuseCount = #{refuseCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, takeRemark = #{takeRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qualifiedCount = #{qualifiedCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unqualifiedCount = #{unqualifiedCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checkRemark = #{checkRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, warehouseSerial = #{warehouseSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, positionSerial = #{positionSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stockCount = #{stockCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unstockCount = #{unstockCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stockRemark = #{stockRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delFlg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where serialNum = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(s.serialNum) from stockInOutRecord s left join delivery d on d.serialNum = s.deliverSerial left join deliveryMateriel dm on dm.deliverSerial = s.deliverSerial
and s.status= #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select dm.serialNum from deliveryMateriel dm left join stockInOutRecord s on dm.deliverSerial = s.serialNum where dm.delFlg = '0' and s.tatus=1

select dm.serialNum as serialNum ,dm.stockCount,dm.batchNum,s.serialNum as s_serialNum, s.deliverSerial, s.takeDeliverSerial, s.inOutNum,s.inOutType,s.stockDate, s.operator, s.contactNum, s.status, s.remark, s.delFlg, s.creator, s.createTime, s.updater, s.updateTime, d.supplyComId,d.deliverNum,dm.orderMaterielSerial,o.orderNum,o.buyComId
from stockInOutRecord s
left join delivery d on d.serialNum = s.deliverSerial left join deliveryMateriel dm on d.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial left join orderInfo o on o.serialNum = d.orderSerial
where dm.delFlg=0 and s.delFlg=0 and s.status=1 and o.buyComId is not null and s.deliverSerial in
#{idList}

select dm.serialNum as serialNum ,dm.stockCount,dm.batchNum,s.serialNum as s_serialNum, s.deliverSerial, s.takeDeliverSerial, s.inOutNum,s.inOutType,s.stockDate, s.operator, s.contactNum, s.status, s.remark, s.delFlg, s.creator, s.createTime, s.updater, s.updateTime, d.supplyComId,d.deliverNum,dm.orderMaterielSerial,o.orderNum,o.buyComId
from stockInOutRecord s
left join delivery d on d.serialNum = s.deliverSerial left join deliveryMateriel dm on d.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial left join orderInfo o on o.serialNum = d.orderSerial
where dm.delFlg=0 and s.delFlg=0 and s.status=1 and o.buyComId is not null and s.status=1 and s.deliverSerial in
#{idList}

select dm.serialNum as serialNum ,dm.stockCount,s.serialNum as s_serialNum, s.deliverSerial, s.takeDeliverSerial, s.inOutNum,s.inOutType,s.stockDate, s.operator, s.contactNum, s.status, s.remark, s.delFlg, s.creator, s.createTime, s.updater, s.updateTime, d.supplyComId,d.deliverNum,dm.orderMaterielSerial,o.orderNum,o.buyComId from stockInOutRecord s left join takeDelivery td on td.serialNum = s.takeDeliverSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.serialNum = td.deliverSerial left join deliveryMateriel dm on td.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial left join orderInfo o on o.serialNum = d.orderSerial where dm.delFlg=0 and s.delFlg=0 and o.buyComId is null and s.status=1 and s.takeDeliverSerial in
#{idList}

select dm.serialNum as serialNum ,dm.stockCount,s.serialNum as s_serialNum, s.deliverSerial, s.takeDeliverSerial, s.inOutNum,s.inOutType,s.stockDate, s.operator, s.contactNum, s.status, s.remark, s.delFlg, s.creator, s.createTime, s.updater, s.updateTime, d.supplyComId,d.deliverNum,dm.orderMaterielSerial,o.orderNum,o.buyComId from stockInOutRecord s left join takeDelivery td on td.serialNum = s.takeDeliverSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.serialNum = td.deliverSerial left join deliveryMateriel dm on td.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial left join orderInfo o on o.serialNum = d.orderSerial where dm.delFlg=0 and s.delFlg=0 and o.buyComId is not null and s.status=1 and s.takeDeliverSerial in
#{idList}

select dm.serialNum as serialNum ,dm.stockCount,s.serialNum as s_serialNum, s.deliverSerial, s.takeDeliverSerial, s.inOutNum,s.inOutType,s.stockDate, s.operator, s.contactNum, s.status, s.remark, s.delFlg, s.creator, s.createTime, s.updater, s.updateTime, d.supplyComId,d.deliverNum,dm.orderMaterielSerial,o.orderNum,o.buyComId, dm.warehouseSerial as warehouseSerial,dm.positionSerial as positionSerial from stockInOutRecord s left join takeDelivery td on td.serialNum = s.takeDeliverSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.takeDeliverSerial = td.serialNum left join deliveryMateriel dm on td.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial left join orderInfo o on o.serialNum = d.orderSerial where dm.delFlg=0 and s.delFlg=0 and s.status=1 and s.takeDeliverSerial in
#{idList}

SELECT sib.serialNum AS serialNum, sib.stockInCount AS stockCount, sib.batchNum, s.serialNum AS s_serialNum, s.deliverSerial, s.takeDeliverSerial, s.inOutNum, s.inOutType, s.stockDate, s.operator, s.contactNum, s. STATUS, s.remark, s.delFlg, s.creator, s.createTime, s.updater, s.updateTime, d.supplyComId, d.deliverNum, dm.orderMaterielSerial, o.orderNum, o.buyComId, sib.warehouseSerial AS warehouseSerial, sib.positionSerial AS positionSerial FROM stockInbatch sib LEFT JOIN deliveryMateriel dm ON dm.serialNum = sib.stockInMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN takeDelivery td ON td.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.serialNum = td.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN stockInOutRecord s ON td.serialNum = s.takeDeliverSerial LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.serialNum = dm.orderMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum = om.orderSerial LEFT JOIN stock stock ON stock.materielSerial = om.materielSerial AND ( ( stock.manageType = '1' AND o.orderType != '委托采购' ) OR ( stock.manageType = '2' AND o.orderType = '委托采购' AND stock.materielOwner = ( SELECT orderInfo.buyComId FROM orderInfo WHERE orderInfo.orderNum = o.orderSerial and orderInfo.delFlg = 0 limit 1 ) ) )
WHERE stock.serialNum = #{serialNum} and s.status=1;

SELECT sib.serialNum AS serialNum, sib.stockInCount AS stockCount, sib.batchNum, s.serialNum AS s_serialNum, s.deliverSerial, s.takeDeliverSerial, s.inOutNum, s.inOutType, s.stockDate, s.operator, s.contactNum, s. STATUS, s.remark, s.delFlg, s.creator, s.createTime, s.updater, s.updateTime, d.supplyComId, d.deliverNum, dm.orderMaterielSerial, o.orderNum, o.buyComId, sib.warehouseSerial AS warehouseSerial, sib.positionSerial AS positionSerial FROM stockInbatch sib LEFT JOIN deliveryMateriel dm ON dm.serialNum = sib.stockInMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN takeDelivery td ON td.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.serialNum = td.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN stockInOutRecord s ON td.serialNum = s.takeDeliverSerial LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.serialNum = dm.orderMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum = om.orderSerial LEFT JOIN stock stock ON stock.materielSerial = om.materielSerial AND ( ( stock.manageType = '1' AND o.orderType != '委托采购' ) OR ( stock.manageType = '2' AND o.orderType = '委托采购' AND stock.materielOwner = ( SELECT orderInfo.buyComId FROM orderInfo WHERE orderInfo.orderNum = o.orderSerial and orderInfo.delFlg = 0 limit 1 ) ) )
WHERE stock.materielSerial = #{serialNum} and (stock.manageType = '1' or stock.materielOwner = (SELECT orderInfo.buyComId FROM orderInfo WHERE orderInfo.serialNum = #{orderSerial}))and s.status=1;
